page.title: 19SHOPPING HABBITS
page.content: We interviewed 40 people.35% were under 25,33% were 25-50 and 35% were 50+.The majority of people shopped in Malvern.Most of these used Malvern Link 31% of the people shopped during the week and others shopped at weekends.33% shopped twice a week,22% people shopped three times a week,30% shopped once a week.Six people spent under Â£10.00 on shopping,11 people who spent Â£10-Â£20,14 people spent Â£20-Â£40 and 8 people spent more than Â£40.00. The majority of the people thought that Malvern is adequate for shopping. But some thought that Malvern needed more general stores.If people were unable to find the items they needed in Malvern they would travel to the nearest large shopping area which is situated six miles away in Worcester.
